name: Quest? Quest!
description:
OverviewTake control of a hero in a completely ordinary and not at all suspicious fantasy kingdom. Will you accept your quest, train with knights, fight dragons, witches, and orcs to save damsels in distress? Along the way, remember to enjoy questing through the countryside, slaying monsters, not reading in to things or looking to closely at your surrounding, and helping citizens of the kingdom.Features
  • Over 31 unique enemies to fight.
  • More than makes up for apparent lack of quality with sparkling wit and puddles of character.
  • Remarkably generic but still adequate story-line.
  • Absolutely no twists or turns.
  • If anyone tells you that more interesting things happens in this game just ignore them.
  • Just cut them out of your life.
  • Also this whole game was basically made by one guy.
  • I did get some help with the music and some small coding things.
  • but beside that it was all me.
